title: Faceit Skill Rankings
description: A Google Chrome extension for tagging Faceit players as good or bad and ranking them based on votes.

title: Dark Stories
description: An interactive game with a mysterious onboarding screen and game logic for storytelling.

title: Vinted Chrome Extension
description: A browser extension for filtering items on Vinted by location, helping users find what they need more easily.

title: Futsal Management System
description: A project focused on managing futsal tournaments and player statistics, with enhanced rules and logic.
